QuestData.Title: Return To Angrathar
QuestData.Description: With Antiok slain and the scythe in our possession, the frost wyrm assaults upon your forces at Angrathar will halt. The wyrms that remain in the Dragonblight will be hunted and destroyed, their bones returning to the earth.$B$BThe time to make your final stand is now, $n. Return to Fordragon Hold and notify Highlord Fordragon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Highlord Bolvar Fordragon at Fordragon Hold and tell him of your victory over the Scourge.
QuestData.RewardText: Know this: all that you have done has led to this moment. Without your efforts, we would have been finished! Now, stand guard as I take to the field and end this!
